active_incidents.title: Users may be experiencing increased loading time or delays when switching between channels

notes.body: We are continuing to investigate the issue where some users are experiencing delays when loading or switching channels, conversation history or the Threads view. Users have also reported trouble with sending messages.  We'll continue to provide updates on a regular basis.  Thank you for your patience!

We are still investigating the issue where some users are experiencing delays when loading or switching channels, conversation history or the Threads view. We'll let you know as soon as we have more details to share.

Users are experiencing delays when loading or switching channels, conversation history or the Threads view.  We're continuing to investigate, and will let you know as soon as we have more information. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Users may experience delays when loading channels, conversation history or when switching channels. We're investigating and will let you know as soon as we have more information. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
